textboxes.description: It's a dry, sweltering day, and the land around you is parched. Em decides to attempt a rain summoning ritual to bring relief to the earth. She prepares her ritual tools and considers how best to approach the task.

choices.text: Use Arcanism to cast a rain-summoning spell

skill_check.fail: The spell fizzles, with only a few drops appearing in the sky before vanishing.

choices.text: Use Spiritism to invoke the water spirits

skill_check.fail: The spirits seem reluctant, whispering that they cannot help.

choices.text: Use Convoking to gather local animals as part of a summoning ritual

skill_check.fail: The animals scatter, uneasy with the ritual.

textboxes.description: Em focuses her Arcanism skill, drawing arcane symbols in the air and chanting. Clouds begin to gather overhead, but they're thin and pale.

choices.text: Focus harder and channel more energy into the spell

skill_check.fail: Em loses control, and a sudden burst of lightning strikes close by!

choices.text: Let the spell run its course and hope for the best

textboxes.description: Em calls on the water spirits, asking for their assistance in bringing rain. A mist starts to gather, swirling around her as if the spirits are listening.

choices.text: Thank the spirits and ask them to stay until the rain falls

skill_check.fail: The mist fades away without a drop of rain.

choices.text: Promise the spirits an offering if they help

textboxes.description: Em uses her Convoking skill to gather local birds, frogs, and even a few small mammals, asking them to join her in calling for rain.

choices.text: Lead them in a rhythmic chant to summon the rain

skill_check.fail: The animals scatter, sensing something is wrong.

choices.text: Scatter seeds as an offering to encourage them to stay

textboxes.description: Em pushes her limits, pouring all her energy into the rain spell. The sky darkens, and thunder rolls. Heavy rain begins to fall, drenching the land and finally bringing relief.
The spirits linger, gathering more mist around Em until a gentle rain begins to fall. It’s not a downpour, but it brings much-needed moisture to the dry soil.
The animals join Em in a rhythmic chant, and soon, clouds gather above. A soft, steady rain starts to fall. Em feels a sense of connection with the creatures around her.
Em lets the spell take its course, but the clouds drift apart, leaving only a few scattered drops. It seems that her magic wasn’t enough this time.
The spirits agree to help in exchange for an offering. They summon a light rain, and Em feels their presence fade with the last drops.
The animals remain as Em scatters seeds. Rain clouds slowly gather, and a gentle drizzle begins, nourishing the plants and animals around her.
